resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Some dogs look really similar to purebred dogs that we know nowadays. For exemple, this one looks like a <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/French_Bulldog" target="_blank" rel="noopener">French Bulldog...

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Unlike the previous poster, this poster mainly focus on the diversity among dogs. Several dog shows iteration later, selective breeding seems to have grown in importance within the kennel club.
resource.chars: Unlike the previous poster, this poster mainly focus on the diversity among dogs. Several dog shows iteration later, selective breeding seems to have grown in importance within the kennel club.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Hunting imagery is still present : here is a hound pack, which evokes the "vénerie". The other dogs on the top of the poster also tend to be hunting hounds, or at least dogs with more traditionnal features and roles than the ones on the bottom of the poster.
resource.chars: Hunting imagery is still present : here is a hound pack, which evokes the "vénerie". The other dogs on the top of the poster also tend to be hunting hounds, or at least dogs with more traditionnal features and roles than the ones on the bottom of the poster.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Dogs on the bottom of the poster have more diverse features than the ones on the top of the poster, in terms of shapes and fur. They represent the diversity that selective breeding created. Dogs were no longer seen as purely utilitarian.
resource.chars: Dogs on the bottom of the poster have more diverse features than the ones on the top of the poster, in terms of shapes and fur. They represent the diversity that selective breeding created. Dogs were no longer seen as purely utilitarian.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The dogs in the bottom are mainly indoors dogs and dogs kept for enjoyment. The ribbon worn by this poodle symbolizes this aspect.
resource.chars: The dogs in the bottom are mainly indoors dogs and dogs kept for enjoyment. The ribbon worn by this poodle symbolizes this aspect.
